entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
